decks.notes: This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruptive elements, utilizing the power of red, white, and blue cards in a Legacy format. The deck includes a variety of control elements such as counterspells and removal spells, as well as powerful aggressive threats like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Gilded Drake. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional value and flexibility in gameplay. Overall, the deck focuses on efficiently controlling the board while applying pressure with a mix of creatures and spells.

The primary focus of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while applying pressure through aggressive creatures and countermagic. By utilizing cards like Thoughtseize, Daze, and Force of Will, this deck aims to control the tempo of the game and prevent the opponent from establishing a strong board presence. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Murktide Regent and Brazen Borrower provides a quick clock to win the game efficiently. Overall, this deck combines disruptive elements with aggressive threats to create a fast-paced and versatile strategy.

This deck focuses on quickly establishing board presence and disrupting the opponent's game plan by utilizing a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. The key strategy is to control the tempo of the game by efficiently removing threats with removal spells like Fatal Push and Dismember, while also countering spells with Force of Will and Spell Pierce. The deck aims to establish an early advantage with efficient creatures like Murktide Regent and Nethergoyf, while continuously disrupting the opponent's plays with cards like Brazen Borrower and Wasteland. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent before they can establish their own game plan.

The main concept of the deck is to quickly and efficiently get powerful creatures into play from the graveyard using cards like Entomb, Reanimate, and Animate Dead. The deck aims to utilize the combo of powerful creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Archon of Cruelty to control the game and overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes disruption and protection spells like Force of Will, Daze, and Thoughtseize to ensure the combo can go off smoothly. Land destruction with cards like Wasteland is also used to disrupt the opponent's mana base.

The main focus of this deck is to efficiently search for and assemble the combo pieces of Doomsday and Thassa's Oracle to win the game. The deck utilizes cards like Lotus Petal, Dark Ritual, and Ponder to quickly generate mana and dig through the deck for key cards. Force of Will and Daze provide protection to ensure the combo goes off smoothly. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student also helps in finding the necessary pieces, while Psychic Frog can be used to manipulate opponents' decks. Overall, the deck aims to set up a powerful win condition in a competitive Legacy format.

This Eldrazi Aggro deck focuses on overwhelming opponents with powerful Eldrazi creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and It That Heralds the End, while disrupting their game plan with cards like Chalice of the Void and Wasteland. The deck aims to quickly ramp up mana production with cards like Eldrazi Temple and Ancient Tomb, enabling the player to cast their big threats ahead of schedule. With a mix of disruption and powerful creatures, this deck looks to close out the game before opponents can establish their own board presence.

This deck focuses on assembling the Painter's Servant and Grindstone combo to mill the opponent's library and win the game. The deck also includes cards like Goblin Engineer and Goblin Welder to tutor for and recur combo pieces, along with disruption cards like Pyroblast and Lightning Bolt to control the board. With powerful mana acceleration from cards like Ancient Tomb and Lotus Petal, as well as disruptive cards like City of Traitors and Ensnaring Bridge, this combo deck aims to quickly assemble its win condition and disrupt the opponent's game plan.

The main concept of this Control - Stiflenought deck is to disrupt your opponent's game plan with counterspells and removal while setting up your own win condition with Phyrexian Dreadnought. The deck aims to control the board state using cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Swords to Plowshares, while also utilizing the synergy between Dress Down and Phyrexian Dreadnought to quickly close out the game. By utilizing a mix of card draw and disruption, this deck aims to outlast opponents and win through strategic plays and efficient use of resources.

This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive Eldrazi creatures while utilizing ramp and disruption to control the game. It focuses on utilizing mana acceleration such as Ancient Tomb and Lotus Petal to quickly drop powerful creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Devourer of Destiny. Chalice of the Void and Kozilek's Command disrupt the opponent's game plan while cards like Sowing Mycospawn provide additional value and resilience. The inclusion of cards like Eye of Ugin and Eldrazi Temple ensures that the deck can consistently play its threats ahead of schedule, putting pressure on the opponent from the start.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while applying pressure with aggressive creatures. It utilizes cards like Mother of Runes and Solitude to protect its own threats while using cards like Swords to Plowshares and Skyclave Apparition to deal with opposing threats. The deck can also lock the opponent out of playing certain spells with cards like Magus of the Moon. By efficiently utilizing its resources and controlling the board, the deck aims to outvalue its opponent and secure a victory through a combination of disruption and aggression.

Utilizing a mix of disruption, card advantage, and efficient threats, this deck aims to control the tempo of the game while applying pressure to the opponent. By combining countermagic, removal, and powerful creatures like Murktide Regent and Nethergoyf, the deck seeks to disrupt the opponent's game plan and maintain a fast pace. With a focus on utilizing key spells and efficient creatures, this deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while presenting threats that can quickly close out the game.

This deck revolves around quickly filling up the graveyard with powerful creatures and bringing them back to the battlefield with reanimation spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead. The key strategy is to use cards like Entomb and Brainstorm to set up the perfect combination of cards in the graveyard, then use spells like Daze and Force of Will to protect your strategy. By utilizing powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with strong threats early in the game.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures and then bring them back onto the battlefield through reanimation spells like Animate Dead and Reanimate. By using cards like Entomb and Brainstorm to set up the graveyard and protect the combo with counterspells like Force of Will and Daze, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a powerful board presence. The inclusion of cards like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Archon of Cruelty provide additional threats and control elements to secure the victory.

The focus of this deck is to utilize the graveyard as a resource to quickly and efficiently assemble combo pieces and win the game. The deck includes cards that can mill the library, such as Golgari Grave-Troll and Stinkweed Imp, as well as cards that benefit from being in the graveyard, like Bridge from Below and Dread Return. By carefully managing the graveyard and utilizing cards like Lion's Eye Diamond and Cabal Therapy, the player aims to create a powerful graveyard-based combo engine that can overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

The main focus of this Control deck is to disrupt and control the opponent's plays while setting up its own win condition. It relies on countering spells with cards like Force of Will, using removal like Swords to Plowshares, and manipulating the top of its library with cards like Brainstorm and Ponder. The deck also utilizes powerful creatures like Murktide Regent and Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath to apply pressure and close out the game. Additionally, it includes cards like Life from the Loam to ensure a steady stream of lands and maintain control over the game.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures like Griselbrand, Archon of Cruelty, and Worldgorger Dragon, and then bring them back into play using reanimation spells like Animate Dead and Reanimate. The deck also includes disruption spells like Unmask and Cabal Therapy to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Additionally, cards like Dark Ritual and Lotus Petal help accelerate the deck's mana production to cast these powerful spells ahead of schedule. The deck aims to win the game quickly by overwhelming the opponent with these massive threats.
